name: Timberbrook's Bandit Menace
description: A bandit group has taken over the road to Timberbrook. Eliminate them to reopen safe travel.

name: Eldhollow's Glowing Ruins
description: The mayor of Eldhollow reports strange lights in nearby ruins. Survey the area and report back.

name: Merchant's Foxbeast Gauntlet
description: A spice merchant needs an escort through foxbeast territory on the way to the city gates.

name: Westcliff's Stolen Ledger
description: Thieves escaped with the tax ledger from Westcliff. Track them and bring it back intact.

name: Southfield's Ravaging Boar
description: A massive boar is ravaging crops near Southfield farms. Bring it down before more damage is done.

name: Acolyte's Foggy Trail
description: A young acolyte must reach the chapel across the foggy Whisperpine Trail. Escort them safely.

name: Mapping Forgotten Stream
description: The cartographer's records are incomplete near the southern stream bend. Map it and mark hazards.

name: Blacksmith's Lost Tools
description: A local blacksmith dropped their traveling tools while fleeing wolves. Recover them near Hollowford trail.

name: Burning Spider Nest
description: A nest of venomous tree spiders threatens woodcutters north of Ventus. Burn it out.

name: Healer's Plague Mission
description: A plague has spread in the outpost of Ashvale. Protect the healer en route.

name: Riverpath Ambushers
description: Travelers report ambushes near the river crossing west of Ventus. Remove the threat.

name: Stonemason's Ravine Blueprints
description: A stonemason dropped his only draft plans into a ravine while fleeing wolves. Retrieve it safely.

name: Timber Caves' Echoes
description: Scout the caves in Timberridge after strange echoes were heard during mining.

name: Scribe's Bandit Road
description: A guild scribe must deliver records to Greenharbor. Bandits frequent the route—protect him.

name: Northwatch Wolf Hunt
description: Wolves have descended from the hills and are killing livestock. Hunt them down.

name: Riverbend's Lost Crate
description: A merchant’s supply crate fell during a bridge collapse. Recover it before scavengers do.

name: Abandoned Mill Mystery
description: Unusual noises have been reported from the abandoned mill. Investigate and report findings.

name: Grain Caravan's Thorncat Threat
description: A grain caravan must reach Ventus safely. Thorncats have been sighted in the area.

name: Marsh Prowler Hunt
description: A rare predator has been stalking villagers near the Dawnmarsh. Track and slay it.

name: Slide Valley Salvage
description: A courier wagon tumbled down into Slide Valley. Salvage what's left of the mail bags.

name: Artisan's Fair Escort
description: A traveling artisan needs safe passage to Ashcroft for the midsummer fair.

name: Marshgrove's Smoke Mystery
description: Dark smoke rises from the bogs in Marshgrove. Explore the cause without engaging.

name: Guildhall Rat Purge
description: The storage beneath the guildhall is overrun with rats. Clear them out completely.

name: Monastery Mail Delivery
description: Courier couldn’t reach the cliffside monastery. Deliver the mail directly to the elders.

name: Herbalist's Thistleway Escort
description: Help an apprentice gather herbs beyond the old Thistleway trail. She lacks defense skills.

name: Ventus' Sunken Tunnels
description: Strange water flow and lost tools suggest breaches in old underground tunnels. Map them.

name: Ridgewood's Hyenabeast Blockade
description: Hyenabeasts have blocked trade between Ridgewood and Ventus. Eliminate the pack.

name: Healer's Moss Retrieval
description: A Ventus healer needs Glowing Rockmoss from caves near Ashvale. Gather and return it safely.

name: Emberdell's Banner Escort
description: The ceremonial banner must arrive intact for Emberdell’s yearly festival. Protect the courier.

name: Collapsed Quarry Assessment
description: After a recent collapse, assess whether the quarry can safely resume operation.

name: Bronzewood Mill Saboteurs
description: Bronzewood’s grain mill has been repeatedly sabotaged. Track and eliminate the culprits.

name: Envoy to Castle Embrance
description: A diplomatic envoy must reach Castle Embrance for treaty talks. Ensure his safe arrival.

name: Stonecoil's Lost Sunstone
description: A miner dropped a valuable sunstone deep inside a serpent nest. Recover it intact.

name: Salt Flats' Unnatural Movement
description: Salt caravans have reported unnatural movement near the flats. Investigate and map the area.

name: Observatory Ruins Expedition
description: A royal scholar seeks to examine a collapsed observatory outside Ashcroft. Provide escort.

name: Ventus' Tunnel Thieves
description: Ventus’ lower city tunnels harbor organized thieves. Remove their ringleader.

name: Embervault's Stolen Charter
description: The guild’s original charter scroll was sold under duress. Retrieve it from Embervault trader.

name: Thornvale's Shifting Paths
description: Thornvale’s terrain has shifted after a recent quake. Chart new paths through the region.

name: Prisoner to Southbridge
description: A high-profile prisoner must be escorted from Ventus to Southbridge without incident.

name: Blackfen's Alpha Serpent
description: Water travel through Blackfen has halted due to serpents. Kill the alpha and clear the waters.

name: Stolen Archive Scrolls
description: A courier lost sensitive records during a highway robbery. Recover them before they're sold.

name: Ashen Ridge Faultline
description: Recent tremors have opened a fault near Ashen Ridge. Survey for elemental breaches.

name: Windcaller's Bell Caravan
description: A sacred bell must be transported to Windcaller Temple. Escort the caravan without delay.

name: Broken Hold Raiders
description: A ruined outpost has become a den for raiders. Purge them and reclaim the area.

name: Emberdell's Lost Taxes
description: Emberdell’s tax documents were lost during river crossing. Retrieve them before inspection day.

name: Goldwater Falls Caverns
description: Fishermen reported strange light behind Goldwater Falls. Enter the caverns and investigate.

name: Frostvine Berry Escort
description: A brewer seeks rare frostvine berries. Escort him through the dangerous woods.

name: Moonveil's Howling Pack
description: A pack of howlers has been attacking supply carts. Hunt them along the Moonveil stretch.

name: Church's Forgotten Relic
description: A silver relic was left behind in a church now overrun by scavengers. Retrieve it safely.

name: Eastern Bluffs Survey
description: Guild geologists need a hazard report from the Eastern Bluffs. Survey thoroughly.

name: Lake Thernas Scouts
description: Support a scout unit traveling to Lake Thernas for border monitoring duties.

name: Merchant Row Smugglers
description: A smuggler ring uses tunnels below Merchant Row. Locate and clear their hideout.

name: Stolen Mining Documents
description: Prospecting documents were stolen from a Ventus mining office. Retrieve before rival guilds obtain them.

name: Cloudmere's Hidden Basin
description: A local hunter claims to have found a basin that doesn't appear on maps. Verify and sketch.

name: Twin Caravans to Hearthpost
description: Two allied caravans must reach Hearthpost together. Ensure both arrive without losses.

name: Snakefang Gang Takedown
description: The Snakefang gang has resurged in Dunmarch. Strike fast and dismantle their base.

name: Gravefield's Oathblade
description: An oathblade was stolen from its resting place. Recover it before it becomes a symbol to raiders.

name: Windswept Range Mapping
description: High winds reveal possible new mountain passes. Climb and chart the Windswept Range routes.

name: Bard's Cragspire Journey
description: A bard claiming knowledge of old songs seeks protection on his journey to Cragspire.

name: Burnt Hollow's Wyrmspawn
description: A clutch of wyrmspawn has emerged in Burnt Hollow. Slay them before they mature.

name: Starlight Compass Retrieval
description: The last working starlight compass lies within a sealed ruin. Recover it for navigation efforts.

name: Magistrate's Ironroot Escort
description: The magistrate must reach a summit in the north. The pass is prone to ambush—protect her.

name: Flintspire Chasm Depths
description: No one has returned from the lowest level of Flintspire Chasm. Explore and report back.

name: Stoneway's Basilisk Hunt
description: A basilisk has petrified livestock near Stoneway. Track and kill the beast.

name: Stonevale's Banner Recovery
description: Stonevale’s war banner was stolen in a skirmish. Recover it from enemy-held ground.

name: Goldenhold's Archive Delivery
description: A sacred archive must be delivered to Goldenhold under heavy risk. Guard it with your life.

name: Blightscar Expanse Survey
description: The ground east of Ventus has begun to rot unnaturally. Investigate and chart its spread.

name: Dustmere Outpost Siege
description: A small outpost is under siege by enemy scouts. Lead a strike to disrupt the attackers.

name: Firevault's Ancient Map
description: A historic map lies deep in the fire-heated vaults of Embervault. Retrieve it without damage.

name: High Council's Urgent Report
description: A sealed report must be delivered to the High Council before nightfall. Avoid all detection.

name: Derathal's Whispering Mines
description: The closed mines echo with voices. Enter and find the source, if any survive.

name: Greenglade's Forest Maw
description: A plant-like predator swallows hunters whole in Greenglade. Track and destroy it.

name: Sealed Book Retrieval
description: A sealed tome containing nobility lineages has gone missing. Recover it discreetly.

name: Frostwatch Avalanche Aid
description: Frostwatch is in crisis after an avalanche. Escort the medics and protect their supplies.

name: Northdeep's Shattered Altar
description: An old altar has cracked open near Northdeep, leaking heat. Investigate with caution.

name: Quarry Barrens Gang
description: A vicious gang has claimed the quarry barrens. Clear them out to resume mining.

name: Vaultcrack's Lost Ledgers
description: Records of debt and ownership fell into the Vaultcrack fissure. Climb down and recover them.

name: Summit Lighthouse Delivery
description: An alchemical lens must reach the lighthouse at Summit Hill. Its loss would blind the coast.

name: Lorn Hollow Caves
description: Lorn Hollow’s caves are expanding unnaturally. Map their growth before they reach farmland.

name: War-Torn Escort
description: Guard a high-value individual through war-torn land to reach their destination.

name: Suncaller's Deadly Threat
description: Wipe out a powerful threat endangering nearby settlements. No survivors expected.

name: Red Knight's Forbidden Zone
description: Enter the forbidden zone and chart it. Previous expeditions failed to return.

name: Frostmaw's Perilous Escort
description: Guard a high-value individual through war-torn land to reach their destination.

name: Veilwatcher's Silent Elimination
description: Infiltrate hostile territory and eliminate the marked target without raising alarm.

name: Starblade's Guarded Journey
description: Guard a high-value individual through war-torn land to reach their destination.

name: Enemy Ruins Artifact
description: Recover an irreplaceable artifact buried deep in enemy-controlled ruins.

name: Frostmaw's Forbidden Exploration
description: Enter the forbidden zone and chart it. Previous expeditions failed to return.

name: Blood Hunter's Escort
description: Guard a high-value individual through war-torn land to reach their destination.

name: Blood Hunter's Elimination
description: Wipe out a powerful threat endangering nearby settlements. No survivors expected.
